page.title: 01Bognor Regis General Review
page.content: The block surveyed consists of most of the town of{Bognor Regis},the village of Felpham to the East and the villages of North and South Bersted. It is an area including shopping areas, large residential areas, industrial estates and some agricultural land. The coast to the east (Felpham) is included as is the large holiday camp run by {Butlins. } The area is situated on the coastal plain of {West Sussex}10Km. E. of Selsey Bill and 9Km. W. of the River Arun. Tourism plays a part in the economy of the area. The area is administered by {Arun} {District Council}which is based in Littlehampton.
